definitions.text: any of various flowers of plants of the genus Dianthus cultivated for their fragrant flowers
a person with mildly leftist political views
make light, repeated taps on a surface
examples: he was tapping his fingers on the table impatiently

definitions.text: sound like a car engine that is firing too early
examples: the car pinged when I put in low-octane gasoline
The car pinked when the ignition was too far retarded

definitions.text: cut in a zigzag pattern with pinking shears, in sewing
of a light shade of red
